sourcesContent:
import '../styles/postcard.css' import { useAudio } from '../contexts/AudioContext' export default function PostMusicCard({ card }) { const { _id, name, author, file, albumCover, albumId } = card const domain = `${process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_SERVICE}/musics/${albumId}` const { audio, setAudio } = useAudio(); function playAudio() { const newAudio = new Audio(`${domain}/${file}`); setAudio(newAudio); newAudio.play(); } return (
{ (albumCover !== "") ?
:
}

{name}

{author}

favorite 0
0
download
) }
